title: Living as the Villain’s Stepmother - Novel Updates

description:
I became the villainess stepmother who is doomed to suffer greatly in the hands of the male lead, who will return as a tyrant due to his years of child abuse.

I can’t die like this. No, I was determined to survive.

However… Why does avoiding a gruesome fate seem so easy?

And, to make matters worse, my husband began to obsess over me.>
